testimonials.title: Olwethu Bhiya
testimonials.desc: Caryn is a very compassionate person who pays great atenttion to covering every aspect in her work. no stone goes unturned with her. Will work with her any day.

testimonials.title: Laiquah Cotie
testimonials.desc: Working with Caryn-Jayn was an incredible experience. Her professionalism, attention to detail, and communication skills made the entire process seamless. They consistently exceeded my expectations and delivered exceptional results. I would highly recommend Caryn-Jayn to anyone looking for a talented and dedicated professional.

testimonials.title: Jadee Paulse
testimonials.desc: In the short time I've known Caryn, her dedication and willingness to learn has amazed me. Caryn is hardworking and a very pleasant to work with.

testimonials.title: Ridhaa Gabier
testimonials.desc: Caryn-Jayn Lodewyk is a very kind person. She is always ready to help the next person despite there situation. She is exceptional when it comes to team work and always make sure that everyone is on par .She is very honest in her work and dedicated in what she loves doing.

testimonials.title: Mezaan Davids
testimonials.desc: Caryn is a creative and enthusiastic individual who is new to coding but has been steadily improving. Her positive attitude and willingness to experiment with new ideas have been a valuable asset to our team. She has a unique perspective and is not afraid to think outside the box. As Caryn's team leader, I have been impressed with her dedication and creativity.

testimonials.title: Taahirah Ismail
testimonials.desc: Caryn is one of the hardest workers I've ever met. Whenever she's struggling with a task, I know it won't be long until she finds a solution. Working with her is delightful, she's such a kind, bubbly, and extremely helpful individual. I'd definitely love to keep working with her in the future.

experiences.roles: Till operator, Sales assistant, Click and collect
experiences.des: My role includes assisting customers at the tills, on the sales floor and processing click and collect orders.

experiences.roles: Bartender, assisting in setting up events
experiences.des: My role was to assist in getting drinks for customers and assisting in setting up for events that took place. My reason for leaving was because staff, including myself, were underpaid and treated poorly.
My role was to assist customers on the sales floor which included providing information about items we had available, what brands we had available and getting the desired items for the customers
